They made you feel at home and they were genuinely kind.  Our food was delivered quick and it was delicious.  We  will definitely be returning.  Thank you for such a great experience.

This is how it's supposed to work. You're going to be in Hartford (an unfamiliar city) for one night, so you go to TripAdvisor, and make reservations at the #1 rated restaurant. You show up on time, and even though the place is hopping, your table is ready. You have your first of seven encounters with waitstaff, and it's friendly and good-humored, as if you are family. Right away you know that someone has taught this team how important their efforts are to the overall experience.

Awesome restaurant with great atmosphere. Good prices. Our server Vinny was awesome and the food fantastic. I have the No. 11 Special and was very pleased. Table service was fast and steady, while one of the owners stopped at our table as well.

I went there for lunch with my family. It wasn’t very crowded and the service was top quality. The waitress was so friendly and polite and the food was very delicious. We loved the cheese and bread started so much!! They also offered us free cookies to take away when we finished. Great experience

name: Trumbull Kitchen
reviews:
I didn't know what to expect from the outside view, but I was very pleased with the Trumbull Kitchen's lunch options during a recent business trip. The place was recommended by a coworker who is local to the area. I was told that it can fill up quickly during lunch, but we had no problems getting seated for a group of five at noon. 

The beer list is outstanding with some top of the line Connecticut craft brews, as well as some national staples. The menu had a lot of great options, and my bourbon burger was outstanding. The sweet potato fries were also very well prepared. 

The interior setting and seating is very stylish, with an old school speakeasy motif. Service was also very pleasant and responsive. 

I will definitely be back the next time I'm in Hartford!
Food and atmosphere was really nice. We had a great waitress and deserts were delicious. Definitely a good spot to go back too.
Food was good, great venue, ate at the bar, nice crowd.  Nice adult feel.  Good outside patio seating.
Very good meal, attentive server.  Seated quickly with reservation.  Food came hot and. In a timely manner.  Wasn't to loud, though it was moderately crowd for a Wednesday evening.  Good experience

Ordered the Grilled Fillet Mignon as an appetizer and it was delicious.  Steak was perfectly cooked (rare) and the tater tots on top added a nice crunch. Everyone enjoyed their meals as well. Very nice ambience with plenty of room in between tables. Will definitely will go back!

name: The Capital Grille - Curbside Takeout & Delivery
reviews: This place is my first choice site.  Of all restaurants I know I love it most. I never miss an opportunity to go to that place. Whenever  I want to go to a decent dinner, this is the place that comes right away to my head. outstanding and varied  food and a rich menu.professional staff members, and great spirit. Also important, the charge is modest. I tell about this restaurant with pleasure.

Stopped by while on a road trip with the family and can honestly say I was pleasantly surprised. Everything from the incredible food to the unsurpassed service, to the atmosphere was magical. The location is just super as well. If I lived in the area I would probably be a regular.

What an amazing and wonderful experience!!!! Be warned, it is a on the pricey side! So worth every dollar though! The steak was so flavorful and delicious, the lobster crab cakes were more lobster and crab than cake. The crab on top of the steak wasn't held back, but piled on! Lobster Mac and cheese so creamy and big pieces of lobster! I have never had a better glass of wine or better dessert! Don't walk....drive there! The valet is fantastic as well! Very speedy and helpful!

I celebrated my PhD this evening in this delicious restaurant. Well we passed a magnificent evening and the restaurant was evidently one of the reasons for this outstanding celebration. The crew  contributed in a graceful way, the meals were very good and my guests were so  delighted. We shall surely return for more celebrations. thanks very much.
Beautiful ambiance, amazing and umpecable service a digital drink/wine menu. Food was amazing! Love it here ...will be back (next time I'm in Hartford)

name: Max Downtown
reviews: I celebrated my nomination earlier this evening in this fine place. happy to tell that we passed a fabulous evening and the restaurant was surely the reason for this fruitful gathering. The stuff  helped in a very nice style, the cooking was tasty and my buddies were extremely  glad. We shall surely return for more celebrations. thanks very much.

Great great great restaurant. We actually went back a second time in the same trip the food was so great. Prime rib was amazing, the pasta small plates were great, the tartar and buffalo cauliflower were great. Honestly everything was so good, we got the baked Alaska twice, if you like marshmallow this is for you.

Some parts are amazing and other parts need improvement.  The decor of this place is amazing.  Love the design of the bar and dining areas.  The mixed drinks are great too.  Probably the best old fashioned I've ever had was made here. Some of the food was great too; lobster pierogi and Mac & cheese were great. That said, the prime rib was sub par. I've had better elsewhere and have even made better at home. It was under cooked, very fatty, and was served with a horrible knife.  I might as well have been given a butter knife to cut this stringy cut of meat. Overall, the whole experience was simply inconsistent.

Relaxing place to have a late afternoon/happy hour bite & cocktails. Service is impeccable and our bartender was "bar none" ;) an artist making a delicious Negroni and beautiful Aperol Spritz! The atmosphere is upscale-downtown while still maintaining a casual feel. The seafood is always fresh and plated to please. Anyone passing through Hartford near the XL Center or locals who are making a stop @ the "banking corner" should duck into Max Downtown!

One of the most reliable "great dining experiences" in greater Hartford and still, I think, the flagship restaurant of the Max family of restaurants.  Always superb beef and fish entrees that make me think of this as a chop house style reminiscent of the great Manhattan restaurants of the 50's and 60's but with a sophisticated contemporary design.  The bar is a great choice for a convenient lunch if you don't have the time to indulge.

name: Black-Eyed Sally's Southern Kitchen & Bar
reviews: Love this place. From the decor, artwork, ambience, music and food it’s just on point. If you like southern food and blues music it’s a must! Came in on a very cold rainy day and just felt the warmth just walking inside. Good food, music, service. Also great atmosphere. Was within easy walking distance from our hotel. Loved their ribs and the artwork on the walls. Recommend it highly.

Have been a few times and the Nashville hot chicken sandwich has consistently been better than the last time. It was pretty good to begin with. Cornbread is good and a few other things I've tasted were good as well. Not a fan of the prices or the portion sizes always but it's pretty good food.

I don't go for decor but if that's your thing, I'm not fond of it. I think it's going for like a New Orleans vibe but whatever it is but I don't care for it. But as I said it doesn't make a difference to me.

Omg! This place was bomb. The vibe was perfect. The food reminded me so much of home. I am from the south and they definitely have got the taste and flavorings just right. We stopped in on a Thursday night where a live band was playing. The music was so good. Everyone was having a great time. If I am ever in Hartford again I will definitely be popping in.

We took the Fastrack bus line from New Britain to go here to see "Jake Kulak and the Lowdown". They had a small cover charge, but the band was awesome and so it was well worth it. As a matter-of-fact, I had gone here before to see another great young local band,  "The New Amsterdam Nobles". They put on a great show and the crowd as really into it. 
I don't know who books the live acts here, but they know good music. 
The food and drinks were all good and the prices were reasonable. I'd recommend trying the ribs or perhaps the wings.
The waitstaff was attentive and kept up nicely with demand.
This is a nice place to go for a meal or just drinks...

Best BBQ that I have eaten in Hartford! The chicken and waffles were surprisingly great. The way they fry chicken is just down home goodness. The flavors from the ribs, beef brisket and chicken were savory with just the right amount of sweet. The rib meat did not quite fall off the bone, but they had awesome smokey flavor. The fixings were next level with melt in your mouth cornbread and red beans & rice. We will be going back soon. Bonus, walking distance to the XL center.

name: Bear's Smokehouse Barbecue
reviews: Bear's BBQ is a cafeteria style restaurant. You get in line, place your order, receive a tray, get your sides and beverage. You pay for your food and go and find your seat. Bear's BBQ is the best BBQ in Connecticut in terms of a restaurant. The food is great every single time and it's high quality food that you can get very quickly. The mac attack is my staple. It's macaroni and cheese topped with Pulled Pork (you can choose your style of meat). The meat and pasta are always cooked perfect. Something about the Birch Beer here is better than anywhere else that I've had it.

The food here was very good. If you like BBQ, this Smoke House is the place to visit. For lunch, dinner, take out and, they even do catering. If you are in the Hartford or the Hew Haven area, you won't want to pass this place up.

Very large menu, great sides, desserts and an outstanding staff. Customer service was very nice and with a smile of kindness. Very helpful and attentive. The Brisket was on the money good. 

Parking might cost you about $3.00 an hour because, you may have to use a parking garage. 

The only reason I didn't give a 5 Star is because, the food wasn't served very hot. However, I highly recommend.

The foods good but the staff is not. I tried to call in and waited 20 minutes and no one picked up. Also tried to order online. I'm about to click checkout when the clock hits 7 30 pm. They wont let you place the order. Had credit card info and everything but still wouldn't let me order. Also the food is very expensive to go along with all of it.

Come here if you want to see how cheap someone can be. The way they cut the meat is like asking a hungry homeless guy to share his food. I've never watched someone work so hard to cut so little. If they cut a little extra off they'll actually put it back in the wrapping and not on your plate. Its amazing to watch. Then they'll tell you its $20 and ask for tip. Following you'll take your jailhouse tray and seat yourself.

In short: Got food poisoning and pretty expensive for the small portions and the fact you have to seat yourself. Won't go back

Ordered and paid a week ahead of time for Easter. Had to wait almost an hour just to pick our order. Then many of the things we ordered (a week ago remember) were not available. Total bust. Very little respect for their customers if they can’t honor what people have ordered. Won’t be going back

name: ON20
reviews: Me and my girlfriend visited and decided to go somewhere fancy for our four year anniversary. It was one of the most amazing meals we've both enjoyed in a very long time. Service was impeccable and the atmosphere was simply sublime. We picked a wonderful night since they had live music and I would recommend to anyone trying to have a wonderful evening.

Great environment and amazing food. Perfect combination regardless if you are celebrating something or just want to enjoy a nice meal. It has the great restaurant vibe without the pressure from the staff. Compliments to the chef. Hands down the best foie grass I have ever had.
Ambience and view were amazing (probably the best one in Hartford), but food was not special. Recommend for special occasion.

Amazing views of the Hartford skyline and out to surrounding areas.  Food is extremely well seasoned and prepared, staff is attentive and not over anxious.  Pretty laid back and relaxing place.  Not easy to get to but worth it.

I was blown away by the food. We had a slow start with service, but that was remedied. We came for the monk fish and were not disappointed. It was incredible. And... HALF PRICE BOTTLES OF WINE. I am not sure how long they are doing this promotion, but it was Friday night and we had an amazing petite syrah bottle for a steal. It was worth every penny.

name: Ted's Montana Grill
reviews: This place is absolutely one of the tastiest place in the neighborhood. Whenever I visit this place I am extremely satisfied. They maintain their high  level service and the topmost level of meals  they provide. You surely will enjoy this this place. Highly  recommended.

Last week was our first time we went to this magnificent restaurant. But It is definitely not the last time. We passed a splendid evening with the generous service, with the first-rate  meal and booze and with the comfortable pay. We will surely come back in a short time.

We frequented the branch in Naperville years ago, and were pleasantly surprised when we noticed one in Hartford. The decor remains the same blend of wooden panels and green leather. The menu is also what we remembered. The crab cakes we're as great as ever with a guacamole spread. And the bison pot roast is tender and goes well with the mash potatoes.  It's great that some things remain the same.

Awful service. Waiting over an hour for food. 45 minutes to be told they were 86 on crab cakes, and 30 minutes for drinks. Just ridiculous! Plus our server David came over once to check on us!! After visiting the science museum, their website  recommended dinning at Teds. I would  highly not recommend going there at all unless you like waiting and sitting there for 2.5 hours. I understand things get busy but no common courtesy to keep us informed. This food was nothing special! I couldn’t honestly get it anywhere. I suggest working with your staff to ensure a better service.  Waste of money and time being there.

Great ambience. Servers were pleasant and very polite. Bison is on the menu and shrimp appetizer was particularly good. Good cocktail offering, enjoyed New Happening with Woodford reserve. The bar also looked liked a lively place for after works happy hour.

name: Sorella
reviews: Located right across from an outdoor municipal carpark, it remains a happy Italian bistro. I stopped by a few weeks ago for a pizza and an iced tea. Their pizzas are not inexpensive but so it goes everywhere now. I must applaud the waitress who was outstanding in service. The pizza was delivered to my table quickly and was bubbling hot. My only problem was salty mozz. I use fresh at home all the time and this cheese was either soaking in salt water, or more salt had been used in the recipe. So here's the daft me. I removed the cheese, and brought that DELICIOUS CRUST home with me. You know a good pizza crust by just how long it can remain in your fridge. This crust is thin and yummy, and so three days later, I found myself making a sauteed veggie pizza using the same crust. I will try another type of pizza the next time I visit because I like the vibe. There's a bar counter for those who are the beer and lunch set, but I was fortunate to have a table. A different sort of review, I know!

Great happy hour and even better meals.  I highly suggest checking this place out.  The happy hour options are fantastic.  The house red blend wine is delicious, the pizza is cheap but amazing, and all the ingredients taste fresh so the meals are exceptional.
Stopped here on a very short trip to Hartford. Food was really good and the  service was excellent. Would definitely recommend it here!

two days ago was the first time in this good restaurant. But It is definitely not the last. We passed a splendid evening with the efficient service, with the fine cooking and booze and with the friendly payment. We will surely return there in a short time.
Nice place to grab a bite before the show, summer salad, calamari, and garlic bread mmmmm delish!! Service was great !!

name: Firebox Restaurant
reviews: This restaurant is a winning combination of gourmet dinning combined with a community social service agency. Being able to support a community effort while having a first class dining experience is a winning combination. Service was excellent. The hummus was good and the Brussels Sprouts appetizer was the best we have ever had. My duck was tasty but they should have removed the extra fat. The salmon dish was also a winner.
Wow 1st wings of the day awesome the Hummus was tasty main dish scallops where beautiful. Service great (Amanda)

Let me say first off, the service was excellent. Wonderful setting and ambiance.

I ordered the 14 Oz NY strip steak. Ordered as medium rare and it came out medium-well and dry. Potato puree was lumpy, was borderline cold, and had zero flavor. Sauce was over reduced and incredibly bitter. The rest of the table seemed to enjoy their food so I guess steak wasn’t the best choice? Too bad. Mushroom bisque was flavorful but very grainy. Good drink list.

The last couple of times my wife and I have had a babysitter, we have come here for our date night. The food is exquisite. We always get the Brussels sprouts and I have had both the duck and the pork shank which were to die for. It's a nice laid back atmosphere with energetic and attentive service and great food and libations. If you live in the area and haven't been, you truly must go!

We go here all the time despite it being a bit out of our way. Best Sunday brunch I've found in Connecticut! Great, fresh food perfectly cooked every time. Great, friendly service every time. Worth every penny.

name: Feng Chophouse
reviews: I was very impressed by the food I was served. I would definitely recommend the chef’s choice nigiri platter, some of the freshest and finest sushi I’ve had in the northeast. They green tea cake will not be a bad decision either!! The restaurant is pretty big and ambiance is in line with their food story.

This is a high end steakhouse and sushi sashimi.  In my experience is hard for a single location to been good at both, they do an extraordinary job. Just had an amazing NY Steak and the high end blue fin tuna sushi. We had a large group of 12 people and the service was excellent. Highly recommend this place.

Off the charts GREAT!! There were so many good things on the menu we were having difficulty making a decision. Server was a great help and fun.  Very comfortable and upscale atmosphere. Couldn't have asked for a better night - 5 stars!

Beautiful Restaurant, modern design, great interiors.
Great ambience, great music (not the typical cheap elevator Muzak)
Food was excellent. Portions a bit on the small size.
Service was exceptionally professional.
Would go there anytime again.
This restaurant gives fantastic service and enjoyable menu. One of my favourite restaurants around here. The meals served quick and the rates were inexpensive. I recommend this place.

name: The Blind Pig Pizza Co.
reviews: I was in downtown Hartford on a Sunday afternoon with some friends and was really excited to see that this place was open. A lot of restaurants are closed on Sundays in the area so that was a relief. The restaurant doesn't have its own parking lot but there is street parking and even a garage right across the street. We walked in and the place was already busy (around 3pm) so we sat at the bar. Our bartender was nice and checked on us a few times while we were sitting. We got the chicken bacon ranch and the pulled chicken pizza which were both good. The crushed dorito seasoning really adds to most of the pizzas. Additionally the drinks and cocktails they offer are creative and all very good. I'd recommend a visit in, good food and good drinks.

The pizzas were awesome, and the staff was so welcoming and friendly. We didn't realize at the time, but we went near closing time. They didn't make a fuss over that at all and served us without a rush. We later found out we had cut it a little close and felt bad, but they were so kind about it. We really appreciated it, and we'll definitely be back!

The Pup, Pints, and Pizza event at The Blind Pig is so much fun. Their food is always great as is the service. My server tonight couldn't have been better. Look for their special events; they do some really cool themed dinners. I need to go to try their happy hour menu and their Monday night tacos, which I'm sure are as great as their regular menu.

Our family loves the pizza and mozzarella sticks. We always get a couple cheese pizzas with a meatball pizza and sometimes a bacon pizza. Bacon has a kick to it. Love the charred taste of the crust. The marinara for the mozzarella sticks used to be like a vodka sauce but this past week they changed it. Basic marinara taste but excellent. Usually there isn’t anywhere to sit but Valentine’s Day evening no one was there except at the bar. We always get our food to go but plan on dining in one day soon. Definitely very tasty and fresh food!

Best pizza in Hartford, possible the best in the state. Perfect crust, great and unique styles, restaurant has nice ambiance. On my last visit (5/19) they were clearly short handed but Sarah R was still wonderful despite it being so hectic. Cent wait to come back.

name: J's Crab Shack
reviews: The wait staff was attentive and knowledgeable. I really liked the New England Clam Chowder it was very hot and full of flavor. I got the captains platter which had shrimp, fish, scallops and calamari. I opted for the baked potato which was for an additional fee but was well worth it. My food came in less than 15 minutes I was pleasantly surprised on the speed in which I received my food. As an avid seafood eater I will definitely be back. I highly recommend the experience.

This was our first time going to this restaurant we always hear our friends and family always talking about going but we never thought about going urself. We always thought that chowder pot was the best place to always go for seafood, I can tell you No No No way, from we walked into the place the waitress was extremely nice positive they made sure that we were very comfortable and happy. when we was ready to placed our order we got the shovel that was amazing I mean like it had the best part of the seafood you can would have to buy separately.

Very casual very fresh...one side a fresh fish market the other a restaurant. They make very best clam chowder, great lobster bisque and we have not had a meal there we did not enjoy. Haddock with lobster stuffing is a favorite, along with fried haddock and chips. The lobster roll is great and come on the freshest most substantial roll.

J. - Crab was originally Tinkers in the good ole days. Very little has changed. If you want good, fresh, tasty seafood J - Crab is a great place for it. Always bustling with seafood hungry folks, noisy and filled with laughter. Quality food portions so you won't leave hungry. Highly recommended. Yum!

Great fish and chips. I always get the fish and shrimp combo comes with fries. And the clam chowder is awsome. Been going to the old location on new park Ave for years and now there new location here. Great place to eat seafood.  Better than City fish market.

name: Trinity Restaurant
reviews: Not sure how this place even stays in business – so often it is virtually empty during peak dining hours. With such amazing food, it deserves to have a far wider audience and clientele. Have dined here a number of times and have never been disappointed once! Located on Zion Street, behind Trinity College in Hartford, the restaurant is small, cozy yet chic. Parking is on the street. Beer and wine available.

Awesome food.. Homely decor.. (literally its a home converted to a business) The lady takes care of the guests really well.. I loved every bit of my veggie panini.. The Tiramisu was awesome too.. The lunch service can be little slow, but you will enjoy the food.

The food was delicious and the atmosphere was inviting. The prices were reasonable as well. We had the squash ravioli as an appetizer, with the  balsamic vinegar added it was a very unique and delicious treat. We both ordered salmon entrees, but one was a salmon salad the other was with potatoes and veggies. They were superb!!

Some of the best food anywhere. Squash ravioli are to die for. Soups are hearty, tasty and homemade. Vegetables are fresh and usually organic. Even the little knot dinner rolls are fabulous. Serves wine and beer only. Highly recommended!

If for some reason you still haven't eaten here, you're truly missing out. It has to be one of the very best restaurants in the area. Like so many people have said, the homemade butternut squash ravioli can be habit forming. All of the pasta dishes are wonderful though. The Bolognese is the best I've tasted. The owners, who do the cooking and the serving, also could not be any lovelier if they tried.

name: U.S.S. Chowder Pot IV
reviews:
I came here with a friend to try the Taste of Hartford menu after work. I'd recommend making a reservation, I'm not sure if it was so busy because of restaurant week or if it's usually like that, but people were definitely waiting. 
The food was was good. I got Rhode island clam chowder, blue crab casserole, and the cheesecake. The soup was really good, it had a fair amount of salt but I like salt personally. The crab casserole was also good with big chunks of crab. The stuffing was alright but I personally found it too buttery with too much bread. 
Our waiter was extremely attentive and friendly. All the staff seemed to be friendly with a smile.
The inside seems to be a little dated and needs some updates. Also make sure you drive around to the back since that is the main restaurant entrance.

Yum! 😋

The entire experience was fantastic. The hostess greeted us with a smile and was genuinely happy. We were told our wait time would be approximate 35-40 min, which was fine for us. Our wait time was closer to 10 minutes! 

Our server was knowledgeable about the menu and very cheerful. She was very accommodating with our inability to pick something. There are so many great choices on their menu. We finally decided on the Oysters and Escargot for our appetizers. The oysters were delicious and the Escargot was presented with puff pastry on top, soaked in butter and they were amazing! 

For my entree I ordered the Lazy Man’s Lobster, which was cooked perfectly and I didn’t have to dig through the shell! The fries were delicious and the cole claw was also great. I can’t remember what my boyfriend ordered, but I know he enjoyed his meal as well. If we’re ever in the area again we’ll defiantly eat here again!

From the moment  you enter that place  team give you a great feeling. Very warm stuff, it is a kind restaurant to  enjoy with buddies or with your date. very good  cooking, professional  chief cook and stuff, modest  price and generous  service. Highly recommended.

My wife and I ate there Sunday approximately 1 p.m. . service was great. Started with a shrimp cocktail, the shrimp wasn't fresh nice try. what the heck did you do to the clam chowder? Very few potatoes, and where were the Clans? and watery. Baked stuffed shrimp for dinner. Where's the flavor? I must admit, haven't eaten here over 10 years. The reason Crab Shack! If you want fresh food eat at The Crab Shack. I wanted Seafood and the Crab Shack was closed due to family problems so we decided to go to the Chowder Pot never again thank you

TO GO ORDER ...VERY DISAPPOITING!
Chowder Pot is one of my favourite restaurant. Last week I place to-go order because I missed their food so much. How shock I was when I saw my order. There were half amount of food that I got when I dine-in and it was not fresh at all!! ! I paid a lot of money but it was not worth it at all!!!

name: Vivo Seasonal Trattoria
reviews: Good food, clean rooms. We stay at the Hartford Marriott whenever passing through that way or when we have an event in Hartford. The food at Vivo is excellent, we've enjoyed both breakfast and dinners there. Our breakfast waitress, Christine, is always smiling and provides great customer service. They're lucky to have her! Nadine Mullings has also always provided great service. She's a true professional.
Cozy and warm. Great service and food. Give it a try. I have been several times and it never disappoints.

I love the settings and the atmosphere. It’s lovable! I would have rate this five stars if only things went the way it should be. And I completely understand it was a holiday, so I had my patience with everything that was going wrong the minute we sat down. Despite that, I honestly highly recommend this place for guys who are looking to make their girl happy! Because it’s also reasonable price:)!!

I like to go with friends to this place with my highest recommendations. I  go to this restaurant often. This recommendation is always successful. The the food there is appetizing and the team is efficient and cooperative. Whenever we go to this place we have a cheerful time.  highly recommended.

We had a great dinner there this past fall (2018). My dining partner and I wanting to order two different things, the steak and the gnocchi,  the waitress asked us if we wanted the chef to split the two items between us, which we happily agreed to do. Delicious pairing and amazing gnocchi. Our friend who joined us had a full order of gnocchi which he agreed was perfect. Modern interior. Attentive staff.

Follow up visit in early May this year (2019): 
We returned to have the share the same two entrees we did last fall they were so delicious. The steak with a reduced wine sauce, asparagus and red potatoes and the gnocchi. With restaurants, chefs can change or buyers for their menu items, so this visit was not as impressive. Our food was good but not exceptional as it was our first visit. The grilled sirloin steak seemed to be of lesser quality and the gnocchi con funghi was quite overcooked with a brown crust. Plenty of mushrooms, however. 

This chef did not split our two dinners for us in the kitchen either. We each got one entree and were told to split them ourselves. The bread,  olive tapanade and bowl of olives that comes with your meal is still good, and our waitress did go and find some white bread for us when one of us couldn't eat seeds. Our friend who joined us liked his bolognese alla rigatoni very much. The atmosphere is spacious and pleasing decor wise. Our drinks were well made. There is a large wine selection, too. The appetizer portion of the menu could use a little variety as there's nothing we have felt like ordering this visit or the previous one. Photos from May meal below.

name: DISH Bar & Grill
reviews: On a holiday weekend, the restaurant was relatively empty at dinner, but the staff seated everyone together in the front room and took good care of us. We appreciated their recommendations about the menu. Both cocktails and food were very good. We particularly enjoyed the shisito pepper appetizer, the short rib meatloaf, and the key lime pie. The ambiance is very pleasant. Not sure how noisy the restaurant would be if it was busy.
Delicious menu with healthy options.  Busy but the staff was very attentive.  We also were able to doodle on the paper table.  Very enjoyable. Thank you.

I celebrated my nomination earlier this evening in this fine place. Well we enjoyed a sensational evening and the venue was undoubtedly the reason for that fruitful event. The waiters  collaborated in a splendid style, the cooking was delicious and my friends were very  glad. We shall absolutely visit again for more joyful events. thanks very much.

My husband and went to Dish for brunch. We loved it! Our waiter Matt was very attentive and was a big part in making our dining experience great! We started with the Calamari appetizer, it was so good breaded and cooked perfectly! My husband had the Maryland Crabcake Benedict, and I had the Shrimp and Grits! Both dishes did not disappoint! I would highly recommend Dish Bar and Grill to family and friends!

Nice spot for brunch. Small menu makes it easy to find something nice, the inside is beautifully decorated and the servers are very kind. I ordered the crab cake Benedict and thought it was pretty yummy. Service didn't seem slow like had been mentioned on previous reviews, especially if you're chatting and enjoying yourself.

name: Carbone's
reviews: Had a wonderful dining experience here with friends last nite. The service provided by Linda and Christina was outstanding. Although the restaurant was completely full and they were quite busy, both these ladies remained cool, calm and professional. Both were extremely witty with great personalities which made everyone feel very much at home and welcome. The food was amazing. The lemon chicken, salmon and shrimp scampi were enjoyed by all. And the homemade cannoli in puff pasty was exquisite. Loved it all. So nice to see that a restaurant that has been one of our favorites for years is still going strong and maintains it reputation for excellence. Thanks to everyone and we will be back soon.
Best customer service, great quality of food, prices are really good and the environment is phenomenal. Recommended!
The food here is amazing! Literally get anything and you won't be disappointed. The drinks taste great too!  And I can't forget the awesome staff!
Great business lunch. Salmon was very good. Cheesecake too
Always agree to go to Carbone's. Never have they disappointed us. Highly recommended for a special occasion or just a nice night out.

name: Costa del Sol Restaurant
reviews: One of the very few real Spanish restaurants in the area. Used to visit this restaurant every once in a while (a 35 minute drive from home). Always happy to visit: very friendly and efficient servers.   Food was good to excellent. Could be a bit pricey, but you’re paying for the service and the ambiance and the quality. Very clean restaurant (bathrooms always super clean and fresh). IMPORTANT!!! Costa del Sol Rest. is CLOSED (they said TEMPORARILY) but I’m afraid it will not reopen at least not with current owners (for more than 30 years). I hope I’m wrong and they reopen.  It’s been closed for a few months now; I just heard about this yesterday... VERY SAD. Can’t believe it...

I've never had paella before tonight, but I am a huge fan now.  For the quality and quantity of food, Costa del Sol is well priced.  The cava sangria was delightful as well.  For dessert, I had the almond torte was the perfect ending to a fine meal.  I look forward to going back!
Looks like they're going to be closed for Good. Where do I go for paella now?

Absolutely delicious food. The paellas are to die for. Highly recommend. Love the atmosphere they created and they keep the Spanish flair. The sangria although very delicious, tasted more like a juice rather than a alcoholic beverage. It was fine for me but those dining with he would have enjoyed a bolder sangria. Food is delicious you will love it!
Delicious food, excellent service, great prices, I love Costa del Sol Restaurant!

name: V's Trattoria
reviews: I had the classic chicken parmigiana with fresh pasta.  The red sauce was sweet and flavorful.  I then had the bread Pudding for dessert which was freshly made, warm and tasty.  If you are downtown Hartford and looking for a good Italian restaurant, then this is the place to go.

Great service, well designed with an industrial vibe.  Had an excellent bloody Mary, the kale caesar was out of this world, and Roberto's Pasta with meatballs.  The food was truly decadent, I will definitely be back.

I love this restaurant! They provide first-rate food, their menu is varied, The cook in that spot is very experienced, I love very much tasting all their food. The dishes are always good, the attitude towards the guests  is efficient. I  go often to this place and I not even once was discontended. I recommend it with no hesitation.
This spot offers superb service and yummy meals. My favourite spot in the city. The drinks and food arrived rapidly and the prices are affordable. Highly recommended.
Ordered the Chicken Parm platter. Great taste and texture. No tomato sauce from the can here! Great service from the staff as well. Good ambiance and they have a private room if you have a big party.

name: Stella's and Mazie's
reviews: This was my first time going. All the five star reviews are accurate. I had the rustic curry hummus, side of rice and cabbage. If I had ate there (rather than to go), I would have ordered a second to go.

A wonderful journey into your auntie's kitchen is what Stella and Mazie's feels like. Fresh ingredients - freshly prepared, interesting cultural selections, dietary friendly and no long wait. I love the food and the love you feel when you walk in. Run, don't walk and keep going back!

I have eaten here often and have been satisfied with the customer service and food portions not to mention how delicious everything I've tried has been. Small but quaint and love the decor.  You must try the mac n cheese with gravy. The owners welcome you like family. Highly recommends this eatery. Positively the best in african fusion soul cuisine that takes you from West Africa through the Caribbean to America. The Jollof rice is outstanding, the jerk shrimp are always so nice & spicy cooked to perfection!! Fish and grits, domoda, and cabbage are fabulous, I highly recommend it!!

Good Morning.
My Dad and I have been patronizing Stella and Mazies since they opened.  Their food is consistently GREAT.  They treat Us like family.  I call my Dad the “Customer of Month” because he dines there once a week.  And, they’re very accommodating to his dietary restrictions.  Keep up the good work ladies and thanks for all of the Hugs!!!

I have eaten here often and have been satisfied with the customer service and food portions not to mention how delicious everything I've tried has been. Small but quaint and love the decor.  You must try the mac n cheese with gravy. The owners welcome you like family. Highly recommends this eatery.

name: Primavera Pub
reviews: Food is amazing.   So much flavour.   You can really get anything you want and change any type of a dish as you wish.  Great portions.  So unreasonably priced.  Only take reservations for 6 & more.  Nice sized bar.  Will definitely revisit.

The food was great. First time at this restaurant and I wasn't dissappointed. It's like living by the ocean and when the boat's come in and you're eating the freshest seafood.  This is going to be one of my 'go to' spots now.

This please continues to knock it out of the park during this Covid BS..they have maintained quality control on their to go orders and it’s the best I’ve had.  Don’t forget to tip (yes extra cash) for you cheap types that don’t understand.  Keep up the good work and thank you

The Portuguese guys I work with invited me to  Go to this amazing restaurant. They had been talking to me about it for months. And it more than lived up to the stories they told me. The food was fantastic, And the service was  Exceptional.  I can't wait, To go back Again this time with my wife she loves This kind of food.
Great vibes and very personal service. The meals were crisp and delightful. Will clearly recommend this spot to friends. Fair rates and generous portions. Great work.

name: Banana Brazil Grill (Steakhouse Restaurant Buffet) Hartford CT
address: 341 New Park Ave, Hartford, CT 06106, USA
reviews: All you can eat, of everything (buffet, bbq/meat) is $15.99. Buffet only is $12.99. Or you can buy by the pound for $7.99. Best fried banana I've ever had. Very good buffet with ribs, fish, beef, chicken. BBQ meats also great. Yeah, you could go somewhere else and maybe get a little better food, but you'd pay three times as much and it wouldn't be three times better.

I adore this restaurant! They serve first-rate meals, their menu is large, The chief cook in that place is very trained, I like a lot tasting all their food. The dishes are consistently fresh, the service towards the clients  is good. I often go to  this restaurant and I was never discontended. I recommend it to all.

We met with friends at this spot for a meeting. we heard about this place from a lot of people.  Well, it was very successful. the staff were so friendly and we felt good. The food was just great. We loved this restaurant a lot and we will visit this place again. We recommend this place to all.

Truly a neighborhood establishment with an ethnic Brazilian Flair that is great for a nice evening meal during the week. This place is doing it right. All you can eat buffet with plenty to choose from. And their meats right off the grill are superb. You get personal attention from The Grill Master and the price is not to be beat. All you can eat Plus BBQ for under $17. Beer and wine are served as well. I would go back there in a second... and probably will very often. Keep up the great work!

This place is great. The food is great, every sing dish was cooked perfectly and had excellent flavour. Some of the best steak I've had anywhere in the Hartford area. Looks a little dumpy outside, but is a whole in the wall gem. Staff is incredibly friendly and helpful and knowledgeable. Cook on the meat is perfect and the pricing is more than reasonable. Will be a repeat customer for a long time.

name: Peppercorn's Grill
reviews: Think of trying new places but there is always something new on the specials list and I know the food will be good.  Dino is willing to make something special if you ask as well.  You can't get that everywhere you go.  This place is on the top of my list.

I celebrated my PhD earlier this evening in this fine place. happy to tell that we enjoyed a enjoyable evening and the place was undoubtedly the reason for this fruitful evening. The waiters  helped in a splendid way, the cooking was extremely good and my buddies were so  happy. We shall definitely visit again for more events. thanks very much.

I came here with my boyfriend for happy hour before seeing a show at the Bushnell. Happy hour ran from 4 to 7, which was great sense it was in extended time frame compared other restaurants nearby. They had drinks anywhere from $5-$7 and good appetizers. There was only one person behind the bar however and I think that made service a little slow, because it was really popular night. However everything was delicious and I'd recommend it.

I went there other night for dinner and drinks. it was fantastic! The food was so tasty and fresh! I must say the staff was great also!

toasty and fresh

From the first moment  you step in this restaurant  the stuff gives you a good feeling. Very comfortable hosts, it is a kind place to  enjoy with friends or with your date. tasty  food, qualified  chief cook and stuff, honest  price and professional  service. Warmly recommended.

name: Thai Farms Restaurant
reviews: Hands down one of the best Chicken Drunken Noodles I've ever had. Incredibly fresh, cooked perfect and perfectly cooked veggies in the dish. The soup that came with my lunch meal was delicious as well. For a $10 bill, this will definitely stay on my go to list when I'm in Hartford. Plenty of metered parking spaces around the hospital to get in for an hour and have lunch or dinner

This is some top notch Thai food. Spicy and flavorful. I had passed by many a times with stopping in but had the time for lunch today and I'm glad I did. We had to wait a little, there was a lunch rush, but the food was worth it.

We attended tonight to celebrate a post event success for a toy drive. The owner was generous even though we told her 10 would attend. We were a group of 20. We were late and the owner smiled the whole time. 

The food was delicious. I had the drunken noodles. The service exceptional. Some of the best Thai food ever.
Nice small restaurant. Fast service and it looks pretty fancy. Food was great too!
I very much love their dishes and service, awesome location nearby to my house. The cashiers are always helpful. I highly recommend this place.

name: Market Restaurant
reviews: This small, clean, friendly restaurant located within the Hartford Regional Market is shockingly good!! I went there with a colleague today. I couldn't believe there was a restaurant in this location. Clean. Parking. Great burgers, fries, onion rings etc. All items were made to order but were exceptionally fast and very good. Great food. Great value. Definitely going back.
Good food and a great price. It is in a location one wouldn’t imagine a good place. Great hidden gem and they serve breakfast till 11.

Brian and the staff at Market Restaurant have played a critical role in helping us grow our business.  They are the most professional, adaptable, responsive and thorough corporate catering team around.  I come from the world of catering management and have high expectations.  Market meets and exceeds my standards on a continual basis.  Our clients rave about the quality of the food and rightfully so.  If you're in the "market" for an excellent catering company, your search can end right here.
Exceptional place to eat something when in a rush. Their customer service is efficient, pricing is convenient, great character. Will visit here again
Excellent food, excellent value, super nice people. Basic decor (not a great first-date place).

name: Monte Alban Restaurant
reviews: Our family settled on having Mexican Food recently and we met at Monte Alban for lunch. We had been there before - the lunch specials are very appealing and we settled on the Pork Burrito, Beef Burrito with extra onions, and Mole Enchiladas - each served with a Mexican Rice and Refried Beans with a dab of Corn Pudding. A side dish of a perfect Chicken Tamale started us off and it was all very delicious. We were full very satisfied very happy with the food and the service when we left! We will come again!!!

Summary: Authentic Mexican restaurant serving all the classic fare such as tacos, burritos, and enchiladas with various meat options. The flavor of the food is more authentic than other Mexican restaurants and various meats are seasoned superbly. The restaurant is lively, especially during the summer, and the service is excellent.

Must Try: Lengua burrito and tacos
Also Recommended: Gordita.
Avoid: N/A

⭐⭐⭐⭐ - Great, worth a detour

Monte Alban is one of the best smaller Mexican restaurants as I enjoy their authenticity (food, vibe, music), great/caring service each time I go. I have never been disappointed each time I have came here. Their chicken burrito dish is very fulling as it is tasty.

two days ago was our first time in this good restaurant. But It is no doubt not the last time. We had a good time with the attentive service, with the high quality  food and wine and with the comfortable payment. We will definitely go back there in a short time.

Average neighborhood Mexican. Mole
Poblano and tacos were very tasty, but the veggie burrito was missing flavor . The chicken in the chicken quesadilla was cooked to death

name: J Restaurant and Bar
reviews: I am lucky to have been introduced to J Restaurant 8 years ago when a colleague brought me to lunch to meet the owner and enjoy the food. As a foodie, it didn't take me long to realize how much J (Jordan) cares about the quality of each dish and the customer service provided by the servers and the bartenders. And yes this converted pizza place still serves great pizza but what is so impressive is how J restaurant continues to explore new tastes, new wines, and new cocktails. If you have not been there, make a point to go to stop in for dinner before or after a show at the Bushnell, see a show at the Arts Academy or just seek outstanding, gastronomical delights. You wont be sorry.

J Restaurant are wonderful to work with and their cuisine is mouthwatering! Great team and even better food! I had the pleasure of working with them for a client's wedding and their catering was top notch! I highly recommend them. Kris & Jordan are awesome to work with - organized and on top of things. Exactly what you need in catering a special event!
We had a great time! The atmosphere inside AND outside were amazing!!

I take my family to this nice place quite a bit! This is the best place to eat.  I visit this place many times. The meals are very tasty, the staff is helpful and the prices are decent. I like meeting in this restaurant over a good meal.
Beautiful restaurant. Owner is very friendly and great food each time! Looking forward to the next visit!

name: Republic at the Linden
reviews: Really nice chick place. I have been there twice and it was great. I didn't get food but my friends did and they liked the food as well. Service was good and fast

Phenomenal restaurant.  Great atmosphere great food we got the cheese steak and the beef Wellington both were prepared to perfection.  And the smoked ribs app was also some of the best ribs I've ever had.  Don't skip the dessert the sorbet was incredibly good
Fillet mignon was flavorless but tender, nachos ok, oysters with raspberry vinaigrette were really good and fresh, avocado toast was meh
Wonderful environment and super amiable service. The menu was fresh and enchanting. Will clearly recommend this restaurant to friends and family. Convenient prices and big portions. Great job.

Visited for birthday 🎂 brunch with large group.  Wait staff handle large groups just as well as couples. Kali, Kar and Jessica were very attentive and precise with all orders from kitchen, bar and split checks accurately. Will visit again in the future. Make your own Bloody Mary bar recommended.👏🥂🍸🎊🍽🍴

name: Dunn's River Jamaican Restaurant
reviews: This place is my favorite. I go to a lot of restaurants but to this place I go the most. The crew is very friendly and the cuisine they serve is so flavorful. I never decline to have a good meal in this place. Highly recommended.
DO NOT park at Star Chinese food and run over to Dunn's River.  My medium meal cost me $120.00 due to my car being lifted on a tow truck.  Verrrry angry...

Why were my veggies spicy hot? Why were there hot green peppers in my food? Why was my fish spicy hot? Higher priced and smaller portions compared to others. My aunt finished her whole dinner in one sitting, and she never does that. Gave it a boost in stars because they do have a lot of patrons, so they must be doing something right, I guess. I'm not so impressed though.

I made the trek from Amherst to this place and let me tell you I was not disappointed . I got the brown stew fish with ground provision and I would 10/10 go there again. The food was absolutely sublime! The only thing was the peanut punch was kinda watery but I can’t blame them for that. And the Johnny cake was good to...it wasn’t hard to eat like big stone or nothing . Overall very good food and I will go back!

The steam fish, with white rice is excellent, when freshly made...

Service is decent, and music is nice. 

Wait times could be better, but their not serving burgers here. 

Would have given a 5, but had maybe one or two slip ups here after 7pm with this place. Seems they tend to not make anything fresh fish Wise after a certain time. 

Also, it seems things are often not available, or they run out at times.

name: Ashley's Restaurant
reviews: Found this place on Trip Advisor looking for something new. Not too far off the highway but parking could be an issue. There is parking on the street but if spots are all taken.... My meal was good. I had French toast. I was there early and had the place to myself and couple people with takeaway orders. It seems like a place where locals go. Good food. Not fancy. Reasonably priced. If you want fancy go elsewhere. I would not hesitate to come back.
Homestyle diner with good breakfast options. Hash browns were really good, condiments (syrup and jam) tasted like cheap quality. Service was okay but food came out fast, decently priced.

Although i didn't take any pictures i can ASSURE you Ashley's Restaurant is that Great homemade kinda food! I went here ONE time On a Friday early afternoon the place was outstandingly clean you can sit on the stools or in a both the cook is right there making all orders!! The home fries are fresh potatoes coffee was great the toast was perfectly toasted and the French toast was Perfectly cooked. I'm hooked I'll be going back 100% i didn't even know anything about Ashley's I'm happy my boyfriend new about it from years ago when he use to go with his great friends patty and June. 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 stop in you'll be glad you did!

Been going here for years. They cook your order almost in front of you and can add almost anything you want on the menu at the last minute. Great spot to eat great diner food and be full with great prices. Relaxed atmosphere friendly workers who pay attention to their customers.
i love this little diner style cafe.... it reminds me of my older days in ny where we would find spots like this & make them our hangout. highly recommend this spot

name: Sunberry Cafe & Catering
reviews: Yesterday was the first time in this magnificent restaurant. But It is obviously not the last time. We enjoyed the evening very much with the good service, with the exceptional  dishes and wine and with the comfortable cost. We will definitely come back in a short time.

I needed a Healthy meal this week before my many corporate Italian Pasta and Pizza meals we would be having.  Sunberry Cafe was an awesome surprise.... I had the BBQ Tofu and vegetables.   Amazingly fresh and great flavor. Short walk from the Marriott.

The food here is average at best. The prices are not reasonable for the quality of the and they have too many options on their menu. Perhaps if they stuck to one type of food and mastered that, the food quality would be better.

If you're in the mood for something but you're not quite sure what you want then this is the place to go.  They have a little of everything.  Ramen dishes, burritos, burgers, smoothies, etc.  One stop shopping for all miscellaneous foods.  The noodles we're decent.  I'd get those again if given the opportunity.
I love the a one rice the best. It makes my winter warmer

name: Banh Meee
reviews: Sandwich smelled and tasted like old fridge. Was served spoiled cilantro. At first I thought maybe it was grilled with the meat. Nope. Meat still cold. Bread soggy. Not coming back. If you prefer a cheaper better crispy bahn me, seek kien market on park street

My first "Banh Mi" experience. I got the Pho Mi Banh Mi - would I get it again? No. Too many pickled vegetables and not enough meat. I ended up taking off some it was over whelming. Did I finish it? Yes, but I wasn't licking my fingers wishing I got two. And I was still hungry. Would I return? Yes. The ambiance was nice, very clean and the staff was friendly. I'd probably try one of their noodle dishes and steer clear of their sandwiches. Very well priced for a quick lunch. I could tell these people know what they're doing which is why I give 4 stars. Perhaps Banh mi just isn't my thing.
I totally love this place owner and worker are awesome. Food is delicious and will always support small business owners. I appreciate you all

I love this restaurant! They offer delicious food, they have a rich menu, The chief cook in that place is a professional, I like very much tasting all their dishes. The food is always fresh and tasty, the service towards the clients  is good. I frequently visit this place and I was never discontended. I recommend it to all my friends.
Love the atmosphere! Great authentic food served quick! Healthier versions of dishes set this place apart from many other Asian food places. Vegan options available!

name: King & I Thai Restaurant
reviews: King and I is a hidden gem. It is somewhat difficult to find in a busy street, recessed from the main frontage so that you can easily drive by it. Well worth looking for, though. Housed in a small building that was probably a private residence at some time, it is a cozy little room with no more than 10 or so tables. The food has a great, authentic, home-cooked ambience. As vegetarians, my wife and I often find it difficult to eat out and get a satisfactory meal. This is never been a problem at The King and I, since they can make almost any dish in a vegetarian version. We particularly like their Drunken Noodles. Probably the best Thai cuisine in the Greater Hartford area.

Good service, clean, quick and fair prices. My downside was that massaman curry is by far one of the most popular Thai dishes in America -the one I tried didn't measure up. I tried others curry from so various cities and states but this one was disappointing in the proportions of the meat and vegetables. Taste was okay but lacking color. Above all it had almost no meat for the price I paid. The atmosphere in the place is very cozy, small and romanticish. I would go again to give them a second try with a different dish.

We enjoy to go out. Last night we  visited this delicious restaurant which friends told us about. We passed a lovely experience there with fine meal and a courteous crew and a great  chef. We put this restaurant in our phone list  and we shall certainly return soon. We deeply recommend.

Loved it! Delicious food and our server was so sweet and friendly. We had  fried tofu and Thai egg rolls as our appetizer followed by pineapple fried rice. Everything came out perfect! Will definitely be visiting again

I like this place and being there gives you a sense of eating at home. I ate traditional Thai fried rice with chicken and it was damn good. This tasted like authentic Thai food in the US like I had in Thailand. Also, I tried the ice Thai tea and it was okay. It tastes like cream and water with aroma of tea. However, I would rate 5 star for this place.

name: Agave Grill
reviews: We've eaten here before and it's always good. They start you with tortillas and their fresh, delicious salsa. The salsa is so thick it clings to each chip. I got a pork taco and a beef taco. Both great. My friend is Keto so he got a steak with grilled veggies. Fantastic. Great meal. Glad they haven't lost their touch.

Pretty decent food I got the fajitas, they do not come out sizzling FYI. drinks were pretty reasonably priced for being in the city. The flour tortillas are a little small for how much stuff you get. But the food was amazing overall cleanliness was top-notch.

Not impressed at all, ordered a beef burrito and it was just spiced finely ground beef. I expected a little effort behind the beef, looked almost like a chain food beef. The black beans were very good though so not all was lost. The rest of our party appeared happy about their food but each has had better for the same money. 
Family friendly as a lot of little ones dressed for the local event across the street- nice to see them out and about. Service was excellent as our server maintained my water glass as I was enjoying a brew.
Great atmosphere.  Good food and service.  Unisex restrooms. Handicap access.  Street parking.  Nice bar. They have an additional room on the side for large functions.

Went last night and had a great time. 
Margarita pitcher was a great value and tasted amazing.  The quesadilla was perfect.  I wish they stayed open later but I had a good time was not rushed out to finish our drinks. The waitress Latonya was friendly with a great personality.

name: Han Restaurant
reviews:
Discovered this place in 2019 on a whim with some friends, and have since been back many times.  The staff is super friendly and always seem to be patient and willing to explain hotpot to any newcomers.  

The steps:
pick a soup base
order an assortment of meats/veggies/noodles/etc
make your sauce - they also have little picture guides for an assortment of sauces
cook your food, add some sauce and enjoy!

I always look forward to coming back, its a fantastic authentic place, which is a nice refresh in the sea of chain restaurants.

Summary: Sister restaurant to the famous Shu and another Szechuan masterpiece located in Hartford, CT. The location provides various authentic hotpot soup bases and fresh selection of meats and vegetables. Patrons can also design their own dipping sauces with many different savory options. All broths are excellent but the Chengdu hot and spicy soup is a must try for mala spice aficionados.

Must Try: Chengdu hot and spicy soup and Chinese herbal daily soup.
Also recommended: Tomato based sour soup.
Avoid: N/A

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ - Outstanding, worth a special excursion

Han Restaurant is one of the few places in all of CT that has AUTHENTIC Chinese food. The flavors are incredible, the presentation is always perfect and the choices are great! Great food, drinks and staff. Always a go-to, always leave loving my time there! ❤️

Our server was so patient with us and that helped us make the most of our experience. We learned about all the many flavored broths, made our own dipping sauces to each of our tastes, and enjoyed lively conversation over our simmering hot pots. Highly recommend for both adventurous diners and those that want to taste delicious variations on familiar ingredients.

What an amazing place!! It was our first time and the host (perhaps owner, I'm not sure) was very informative and helpful. We didn't feel like total noobs once we got our orders and were able to dive right in. My dinner companion and I both got the mini pot combos for around $20 each. Everything came out super quick. As you can see, the combo included the broth/soup base, 2 proteins, a raw egg, and a HUGE platter full of veggies, fried tofu, and glass noodles. Veggies were fresh, the meat was delicious, the broth though...wow wow wow. So flavorful!! 

Staff was very friendly and the place has a nice ambiance and vibe to it. I can't wait to go back. They definitely have gotten a regular customer out of me!

name: Fire-N-Spice Vegan Restaurant, Bakery and Juices
reviews: We stopped here with our vegan kids. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Very popular. The place is very small but has a few stools and a bar to eat at. Lots of choices and options to have 3 or 5. The food was good as was the vegan ice cream. Has a small parking lot. Lots of giant flies when we were there which is a little off putting.

Great place for a quick vegan breakfast in the mornings, and lunch/dinner or snacks later. Some sweets and ice cream too. The food is great and the staff is friendly. Cozy atmosphere, but not a lot of seating. 

One of my favorite spots for vegan food in CT.

The food is absolutely 🔥🔥🔥. I have never had vegan food as good as they prepare it. An absolute MUST TRY for anyone looking to have a meatless meal without sacrificing taste! (and their desserts are absolutely divine as well!) The staff is super helpful, and the restaurant has a great vibe to it. The only thing to keep in mind is that it is a little small inside, so if you want to go with a large group you're better off getting everything to go. Also, they sometimes don't have the menu for the day written down anywhere so don't be afraid to ask the peraon working the counter what they have available for the day.

The best take out in Hartford bar none. An impressive quality of food with generous portions. What really makes this place shine is the charisma of the owners, they are the nicest people you could ever hope to encounter.

The food here is hearty, flavorful, tasty, full of protein.... An all-around win. It's a small place, with a few counter seats, so you may want to take it to go if your party has more than 2-3 people, but it's worth the trip! The menu varies daily. I've had 4 different tofu dishes, and somehow they make tofu delicious every time- that's some kind of magic. It's especially good if you like intense or spicy flavors.

name: Vaughan's Public House
reviews: We like a lot to go out. Yesterday we went to this excellent place which we didn’t know before. We passed a beautiful evening there with first-rate cooking and a professional team and an impressive cook. We put this venue in our list  and we will certainly visit again soon.  Highly recommended.

I had a pleasent experience here. I ordered the Shepard’s Pie, Guinness Stew, and a Guinness Brownie. I have to admire the food quality, the taste of the food was homemade and savory, and had a unique pub flavor to it. Vaughan’s is definitely going down as one of the best pubs in the Hartford area, if not one of the best in the state.
Great atmosphere, love it! Drinks are delish and I do like cheesecake but theirs is FLIPPING AMAZING!!!

This spot is my favorite. I go to a lot of restaurants but to this place I go the most. The team is very affectionate and the cooking they offer is so flavorful. I would always prefer to have a nice dinner in this restaurant. I recommend this place with pleasure.

Great place to hit before going to XL center. Quaint bar with upper and lower levels for seating. Menu has great selections and good portions.  The staff is very friendly and would definitely go there again when in town.

name: Tisane Euro-Asian Cafe
reviews: We went for Sunday Brunch and everyone really enjoyed what they had. Our server was very friendly and attentive. It was very busy so we had to wait about 30 minutes for a table. Enjoyed some pear ice tea and iced coffees while we waited. Only thing I didn't like was the section with "regular tables" was closed off so we had to sit at a high top which was challenging after undergoing hip surgery.
Very cute tea shop selling both normal and alcoholic teas. Very interesting. It’s just a little crowded at night time. There’s a big night scene here.

Friendly waitstaff. They had a vegan option for Saturday brunch. Nice music. I got there early (around 10 am) before the brunch crowd rolled in and it was pretty quiet. It got busier around noon. Fairly priced.
I really enjoyed their food and customer service, excellent location nearby to my residence. The workers are always super nice. I highly recommend this place.

Great food, great drink menu, indoor and outdoor seating, cozy and comfortable with wonderful friendly people. I came here alone on a Saturday night after moving to Hartford and met so many great people and had a fun time! I will certainly be back soon. 
This place is popular with locals and is a must for anyone looking to meet friendly new people or just try great food. Also they had a great DJ starting around 11:30pm and they clear some tables out of the way for people to dance but have a separate section for large groups to sit and eat where you won’t be in the middle of the dance floor. Basically, they have everything covered, despite being such a small place. Enjoy your visit!

name: Ichiban Japanese & Korean
reviews: While searching the many choices of restaurants available in Hartford, we came across this place. WOW! The food was delicious and the service was great! As it was our first time, the waiter offered suggestions for sharing dishes and it so delivered. So good. We will definitely return when in the area again. Love the Bibimbop at this place. Great service and reasonably priced. The sushi is also very good. Seems a popular spot in the West End of Hartford. Definitely recommend.

A great place with great prices! The staff was really attentive and the food was plentiful for the cost. They gave so many free appetizers when we came from fried fish to soups. This is a great place to come if you're looking to spend a little bit eating out in Hartford.

So far there best sushi I've had in the 5 months I've lived here. Nice atmosphere. Place was super quiet, which made it easy to carry on a conversion. Service staff was friendly and attentive. Will definitely be back.

Parking lot is a bit tight, so keep that in mind if you drive a large vehicle.

First time eating here. Found it from a Groupon promotion which we had no trouble redeeming. Menu has many options, many of which we were unfamiliar with. Our waitress was helpful in explaining everything.

We received several appetizers while waiting on our meal, including lotus root which none of us had ever had before. It was quite tasty! Also the steamed dumplings were incredible. I've had dumplings before but these were so tender!

The portions of the meal were very generous and the food was delicious. We had a stonepot bibimbap, teriyaki steak and a sushi sampler. All the food was prepared perfectly. The sizzle on the bibimbap was particularly impressive as the egg in the pot cooks at the table from the residual heat of the stoneware bowl.

With an impressive array of delicious options on the menu, this is definitely a restaurant we will be returning to.

Food is always hot, fresh and delicious! They have both Japanese and Korean entrees including sushi. I have never been disappointed eating here and the service is always very attentive. I find it a challenge to pick something off the menu because it's pretty endless.  This place is a diamond in the rough. Looking forward to my next visit!

name: Ajamo
address: 30 State House Square, Hartford, CT 06103, USA
reviews: Very kind staff, they made me laugh lol it made my day. Good food, they’ll let you sample things and substitute for ingredients you dont like. They even make sure you don’t have any allergies as they put your food together. Prices are reasonable for a fresh food place, similar to prices at Moe’s.  I never write reviews so this must say something about how good their service was. The best salad I’ve ever had, fresh everything, great staff, much love!

This was AWESOME! I was wondering why everyone was in line here! The owners are so very nice. Everything is fresh . I had wonderful avocado toast w lemon ..was sos ssos good!I would highly recommend coming here ! If your anywhere  close by this is so worth stopping in!
Really wish i had found this place sooner! My salad was delicious and the staff was outstanding. Highly recommend this place if you are health conscious and looking for something fresh, quick & easy.
Fantastic! Owners let you bring your own containers! Really appreciate that.

This my go-to whenever I feel the need for a healthy lunch. The Baja salad never disappoints, and neither do the owner and staff. Very nice folks. Wallet-friendly and pallette pleasing. Can't go wrong.

name: Ficara's
reviews: Ficara's Restaurant is a family run Italian restaurant in Hartford. Everyone works together and really make you feel invited and part of their family. The service is spectacular. My cousin and aunt come here frequently. The staff treat them as family, not customers. The food portions are massive, prepare to take some home and have a delicious meal the next day. The bread served with the meal really compliments each dish. They have a great menu and even accommodate for veggie and vegans.
Great lunch. Veal Parmesan just right. Fresh garden salad, good service. Great prices..

There is so much food you have to take some home. It's as good as my mother's who cooked these same dishes for over 60 years and came through Ellis Island. It's a comfortable atmosphere, no stuffy waiters. You want something, then ask, you get it. The quality of the food is perfect and the prices are very reasonable. You want to drop 300 on a fancy place then go.

We had a party of nine people. We had four appetizers, nine entrees, their most expensive bottle of red (Sterling), and other beverages and the bill was around $200.00. What a bargain! The restaurant is unpretentious and the service is very relaxed, great if you want to relax and not in a hurry. The food was very good. It was very quiet.
Possibly the best Italian restaurant in Connecticut!

name: Nutshell
reviews: We used to love this place.  Had a bunch of parties catered in the past but I feel like the food just isn't as good now.  The menu is very expensive..I don't think there was anything under $20 although they were doing a special for $20 where you get app entree and dessert.    But the entree was very small.  And my wife's cod came out cold and on a bed of salad.  I've never seen that before.  Probably won't be back which is a shame.
The atmosphere and maria's ownership makes it the neighborhood gem.
I visited in dart league night and had so much fun talking to the patrons. Great bartender, thanks Todd, great night. Cozy atmosphere and chill and friendly people.
The ultimate neighborhood restaurant and bar. The food's excellent. Good choices including a few Portugese entrees. Don't miss this place, it wont be there forever.
Delicious

name: Front Street Bistro
reviews: Inventive cocktails, full wine and spirits list.  Upscale pub faire available.
I came to see the new Rambo movie very nice place and good vibe...
My friends and I had a great time. The patio is a nice spot during the summer. Very friendly staff.
I like the food and drinks and decent service.
I have to say it was delicious

name: Broasterant
reviews: Hands down THE BEST fried chicken shop in CT! It's a small family owned shop with fresh and high quality ingredients and the chicken is always cooked to perfection. The chicken is pressure fried yet not oily or greasy. You can't taste the oil at all in the chicken.

Summary: For the price and quality, Broasterant may serve the best fried chicken in the Hartford area. The fried chicken is consistently juicy and seasoned perfectly. The chicken plate is also accompanied by a mountain of french fries and dinner roll. The owner is very friendly and the service is excellent.

Must Try: Fried chicken plate or any other size.
Also recommended: Shrimp and fries plate.
Avoid: N/A

⭐⭐⭐⭐ - Great, worth a detour

Best chicken I ever tasted beside Popeyes but Popeyes better watch out because they have competition because Broasterant have chicken to die for. The staff are really friendly and I will definitely come back and eat here. I recommend this place to everybody. If I can give them 100 stars I would

The Chicken here is Excellent!!! With such limited options I thought it would be suspect. But nahhhhh I was wrong. Its all about the quality of the chicken.   Number 2 on my list of Chicken Spots n the State!!!
Awesome fried chicken with fries.  They are made to order. Open until late AM.

name: El Pollo Guapo
reviews: wow the food is so flavorful! Happened to be in area couple times visiting a client and this has become a go to place for lunch. The service is quick and the food is delicious! I wasn’t too sure about trying veggie tacos, I’m glad I did because they were incredible! 👍

Really enjoyed the bowl I had here and the service was super fast and friendly! I had the chicken bowl with blueberry pomegranate green tea, and at first I wasn’t sure how I’d like all of the ingredients in it, but once combined, it was delicious. We also got a side of guac that was really good and definitely enough to take to go

More take out out oriented than eat in (although there are tables. Unfortunately they didn't take orders by phone but are quite quick to "assemble" an order. They have a unique colelction of chicken, vegetable and rice plates plus a varity of greens. I've been twice and wasn't disappointed. I research various cuisines and cook (as a hobby),so I am always interested in new ways to present standard fare, such as chicken and vegetables in this instance. I would highly recommend the charred broccoli and crispy Brussels sprouts, neither of which is usually not a go-to for many palates, but they are good.

So excited that El Pollo Guapo is finally in Hartford.  Their second location has much more room (about 60 seats) and they serve beer and wine!  The food here is amazing and you really can't go wrong with anything.  Another tip, they have an awesome catering menu.  Definitely give them a call if you are hosting a party!

This was my first visit to El Pollo Guapo and I was wonderfully satisfied.  I tried the "Almost Legal", a rice bowl loaded with flavorful toppings such as plantains, grilled corn, pickled onions and more!  Every bite was delicious!  The location is great, the atmosphere is inviting, and the staff was very helpful and friendly.  Loved it!

name: George's Pizza Restaurant
reviews: My sister and I were on our way to the XL Center to see the Wolfpack play. Sometimes, it's tough to find a reasonable place to eat near the Center so I did some research online. Georges got good reviews. We were glad we went. The menu is extensive and has something for everyone. My sister got a turkey grinder (sub or hero) and I got the grilled chicken sandwich, fries, and a slice of pizza. We both got sodas too. The food was delicious and service was friendly and speedy. The bill came to about $21! We were very pleased and will go back again.

Their pizza is absolutely delicious 
First time I come here and I will be coming back soon!! I definitely recommend stopping by

There's quite a selection of food here, it's pretty good, but there is better pizza in the West Hartford area.

If you like traditional pizza, you will enjoy this place a lot. The prices are very good, and there's a good amount of parking, although this place can get busy at times, and it's about average in terms of. It's a little bit older of a restaurant in terms of decor.

Everybody will find something they like here. This place has been around for a very long time, and after you've eaten a meal here, you'll understand why.
Best pizza in Hartford!!! They have been around for 64 years and not a thing has changed. Quality food with a relaxing and comfortable atmosphere. It gets no better

Visited George's for the first time to celebrate my husband's birthday with our children and grandchildren 
 The pizza was great,  however after eating and asking for the table to be cleaned off to sing Happy birthday and cut the cake. The waitress was asked for a few plates to eat cake on. Once they  had taken our plates that we used for the pizza and small plates were provided the manager informed the waitress that we had to be charged for each individual plate. We were so disappointed that we left and will never go back.  We spent close to $100 and after you take our plates you want to charge us for small ones. I've never ever experienced that before.

name: The Place 2 Be
reviews:
Atmosphere- 5/5: It’s a beautiful place. Nice and trendy with modern fixtures with a contemporary vibe. Tables are nicely spaced out as well
Service- 5/5: My waiter was fantastic. I was given drinks right away and the food came out relatively quick
Food- 5/5: The French toast is amazing. It’s huge. They also have their unique way of making eggs. You’ll see when you get here!
Worth the money?- Yes: The meal was fantastic and the portions were massive.

I really liked this place, but I ordered the wrong dish for my first experience. My chicken and waffles were not great. Most of the chicken had bones, and was extra crispy. So, I could not easily cut bites of chicken with the waffle below. I ate the chicken separately from the waffle but that is not really how that dish is designed. The stuffed French toast was very good, my daughter liked it immensely. The place had very little parking so I worried about a long wait but it is huge inside.
