We were seated immediately at some high top tables. Cute salt and pepper shakers and the whole place was very cozily decorated. I will try the eggs Benedict options or the breakfast quesadillas. We will be back and I expect a 5 star experience.
Absolutely love this place and I’ve only placed an order once. I can’t wait till this pandemic is over so I can actually dine in ! The place is gorgeous and their brunch orders are to die for !
I really like this restaurant. Prices are excellent. Food is delicious. I love their egg benedicts. Service is always good as well. Must visit!

Tonight i made large order through GrubHub, averaging at about $80. I normally have no issue with this restaurant. The food is always delicious but in this instance there were several things missing. Mind you I made the order at 3:38. It was supposed to be at my house by 4:35 give or take a few minutes. I called at 4:55 and they said it was on it's way, which fine, no problem. When it finally came, I was missing my grinder, muffin, and both french toast had no whip cream. I had to resort to going to the corner store to get myself something to eat. So yeah, I'm extremely annoyed considering how much money I spent, how long i waited, and how hungry I was. DISSATISFIED to the max!

name: Siam Hartford
reviews: The best restaurant in the downtown area.  Fast service.  Food is always amazing and authentic.  For $9.99 you get a soup or salad and an entree.  I highly recommend it if you want to eat a great lunch.i always order Drunken Noodles. It's always hot, delicious, and spicy. If you love THAI food and work in downtown, I highly recommend this establishment. The employees and owners are very nice and treat me like family.
Nice vibes and super attentive service. The food was fresh and enchanting. Will easily recommend this place to anyone. Reasonable rates and large meals. Great job.

First the food...I like it, great prices, tastes good, good variety. But the service...when it gets busy during lunch, the service is extremely slow. Even to get water. So plan your lunch hour accordingly.
Came here for lunch and ordered chicken druken noodles from the lunch specials, the taste was good but it was very oily.
I liked the dessert better than other items I ordered.

name: Coyote Flaco Mexican Restaurant
address: 635 New Britain Ave, Hartford, CT 06106, USA
reviews: Great place!  I've driven by for years and finally stopped for dinner. The staff was super friendly and welcoming. The menu had a lot of choices. I had the California Burrito and it was very good and served quickly. The prices are very reasonable. The atmosphere is casual. I will definitely be back to try something else.

My son and I discovered this gem while looking for a family owned restaurant with good home cooked food. The first time we went, we were already talking about going back. Now we go as often as we can. Everyone is super friendly and the food is delicious (I love the stuffed poblano peppers). Fun decor, free parking and great prices. You'll be happy you went.

I like this place! They offer high class meals, their menu is rich, The chef in that spot is an expert, I like a lot eating all their food. The dishes are always fresh, the service towards the visitors  is good. I visit often this place and I not even once was unsatisfied.  I highly recommend it.

Pretty good food and had a good deal for lunch, though it was unadvertised. I got the chili relleno and my wife got the fiesta quesadilla. The menu is fairly limited, but the place was clean with a nice cozy atmosphere

My favorite Mexican place. Go there weekly. The best Margueritas, food is awesome. Staff is friendly and helpful. This is a family run place, food is very authentic. 
In this time of stress and sickness these restaurants need help. Please get food to take out or get delivered from here you wont be disappointed. Hopefully the alchohol delivery will be a go. Their 1800 margueritas are the best.

name: Effie's Place Family Restaurant
address: 91 Park Rd, West Hartford, CT 06119, USA
reviews: Wonderful find in West Hartford. Great service and great food. The staff was helpful with a variety of food allergies and we all had excellent meals. I tried the crab stuffed flounder with was flaky and delicious. We also tried two of the homemade desserts and even though we can't pronounce the greek one, it was delicious. Strongly recommend them based on service, price and quality of meals.
Best Liver I have ever eaten. Clean please and fast serve, very friendly staff.

I had been dying to visit and I finally got the chance. I treated my mother in law there for breakfast and it was both our first time. The place is cute and quaint, the people are friendly and nice and the food was delicious. We will be back for dinner. This is definitely a recommended choice.
Hot food, servers were very attentive.  First time visitors.   Out of State - California visitors. We are here to visit our daughter and grandchildren.
I went to Effie,s place quite a few times. I  had very good service.  I know the owner he is very nice.

name: O Camelo Restaurant
reviews: One of my greatest friendly favorite spot. Great delicious authentic Portuguese food & seafood mixed in with some  American traditional styles too. Great place to relax and watch some soccer games from Europe and other American sports like football basketball baseball hockey etc. Workers and customers are very friendly with smiles. If you ever come here you'll walk out with a full belly a smile and definitely want to come back again along with some family and friends. 🙂

The place was great for Valentine's dinner...the wait staff, the people, and the owner (Catarina?) were so nice, and the food was good. A very nice, fun group at the separated bar area as well. We were nicely impressed and will be back!

This is precisely where the local ethnic Portuguese Crowd Goes to eat. Authentic Native Food and Portuguese spoken almost exclusively. It rates high in my book compared to the few other authentic Portuguese restaurants in the area. Food and service were great. Everybody was friendly and you would think everybody is back in their native country at the local eating establishment. If you want to get a sense of what it would be like to eat at a local Portuguese Pub in Lisbon , this is the place!!!
Great food.  Casual atmosphere.   Friendly people.   Its like walking into a Portuguese cheers.   Lol
Great food.  Nice servers

name: Wood-n-Tap Bar & Grill- Hartford
reviews: Had dinner here on a week day evening with co-workers a few weeks ago. The service was excellent and food were delicious and the price was very reasonable. My guests enjoyed their time here. The fried calamari was delicious. I told someone about my experience a few weeks later and it was a different experience. I had the drinks for the first time and they were terrible. My soup was cold which didn’t make sense because the place was empty. I will not be going back. I do not recommend this experience.

Great bar & restaurant. Pleasant and comfortable. It feels like your neighborhood restaurant & bar. We ate a range of appetizers at the bar and enjoyed every one of them. Prices are quite reasonable given the high quality of the food. I'll be back.

Although the staff was friendly and gave us what we asked for, there was a timeliness that was missing. The restaurant was not full and yet it was a long while after ordering before we got out food.  The food was good but not outstanding. One thing I believe is missing is handmade dressings?  We asked if their chicken tenders were fresh or frozen and they were the latter.  Why not cook from scratch? That’s what the consumer expects now.  The Cobb salad I got was very good and my husband’s chicken wings were good. The other thing that made our visit less than great was that the temperature of the restaurant was too cold!  Who wants to be cold when dining out.  All in all unremarkable and not place we will be anxious to visit again. .
Ordered the Thai Salad with Blackened Salmon and thai dressing.....I'm in love with this salad, had it 3 times in the last week. Perfectly blended. Always fresh and delicious.

Hickory burger was delicious! But I'm so upset i forgot to take a picture of the nachos! Those are the best nachos I've ever had. We ordered the half size and it was more than enough for 5 adults and 2 children. Our waitress Thalia if i remember correctly was very nice and kept checking up on us. Not average checking up on us... like above average checking up on us. Can't wait to go back. Pricing was also great for the quality of food you get. Everyone go check it out. You wont be disappointed!

name: Aladdin Halal
reviews:
This place is absolutely amazing. The mixed platter was pretty good. The hummus was really good too.

The pizza was amazing. The crust was crispy and the sauce and toppings were very flavorful. The employees were friendly and helpful too.

Their baklava was delicious as well.

Would highly recommend!
This spot offers awesome service as well as enjoyable food. One of my favourite spots around town. The food and drinks came out quick and the rates were economical. Recommended.
Great flavor, I love lebanese cuisine! I chose a vegetarian plate 👌🏾 Servings are good, reasonable value. Super recommended, no doubt

Wow one of the best kebab wraps I've had in a very long time. The lamb pieces were generously sized, tahini sauce on point, and the pickles added the perfect bite. AND the prices are fantastic and guys working there are welcoming. Will definitely be back!

This place was dope! I had my first ever pepperoni pizza here because they had beef pepperoni and it was so good! The house hot sauce is amazing and the variety is great. Its also very affordable and the staff is friendly.

name: Chosen 1 Seafood Hartford
reviews: I was recommended this restaurant a week ago and they told me that the chicken wings and seafood are very good.  I decided to try Saturday night. I Order to take out i wait nine minutes on the phone so they could attend me, i order chicken wings, sweet potato, fried squid and fried onion rings but the ladies  forgot to order the onion rings.  They told me between 20 and 25 minutes to pick up.  I entered at 19 minutes later.  The restaurant was super full, there were more than 10 groups waiting, they delivered the order to me within 24 minutes very well, many people left did not want to wait.  Now let's talk about the food, the chicken wings were well cooked a little dry very little sauce, the sweet potatoes were well cooked but saggy for the packaging they use and the squids were very good well seasoned but also very saggy for the packaging they use  and onion rings for next time.  I know that the restaurant was very crowded, I am proud to see that Hartford has an opportunity for small businesses.  When i comments regarding a place it is not to hurt but it is to help correct the small problems that occur at the moment.  It's a good restaurant I don't know the owners just need to be more organized and better managed.  I know it's hard but they have a goldmine in their hands Good luck God bless you.  I will return with my family to enjoy their dishes.
The food is filled with flavor. Our server was Michelle she was great. The price was worth it,  I will definitely be coming back.

It was very good I cannot complain we all enjoyed our food very well seasoned very fresh. We were all so very full. I will most definitely make this a regular stop on my visit to Connecticut anytime I come back. And I most definitely would recommend" Chosen 1 Cajun Seafood." The only thing I would change is the chairs not very comfortable at all but I guess they're easy to wipe down 🙃 also if you have a large group like we did get the shovel and add some bags

4.5 Stars.
Food was enjoyable. Seasoned seafood is always enjoyable. The actually seafood ( crabs, shrimp, scallops, clams) seemed fresh and well prepared. We had the spade (serves 4) and it's adequate depending on appetite. 
Will visit again.

Cheers.
So DELICIOUS. Our waitress was great. Some of the best seafood I've ever had. A must try! I highly recommend. The prices are competitive. Restaurant was clean.

name: The Russell Restaurant
reviews: This is a nice place with great drinks and even better food. The ambiance is quaint yet magnificent at the same time. The owner is very personable and greets customers. I recommend this experience.
Always a great time. Bammy Fries are Amazing
Good food and good vibes! Love the atmosphere but gets really over crowded! Need more space!

Very delicious and innovative twist to authentic Jamaican cuisine with a global appeal. The perfect ambiance and atmosphere to experience the Jamaican food and culture. If you are seeking a delicious casual/business lunch, formal dinner, or a happy hour with great eats, this is the spot in Hartford! The employees are very friendly, welcoming and approachable. The owner was on spot, he blends right in with the patrons having casual chats and being a great host.

This restaurant has a very impressive decor and theme with an elegant ambience. Great for date night, group outings, lunch meetings, dinner meetings. I ordered Peppered Steak needless to share how delicious it was, I enjoyed every bite! Big up to my Yardy fren' who took my spouse and me to this hot spot. Go today and live like a Jamaican jetsetter'. Dress nice and check out The Russell when you are in Hartford. Cheers

name: Aqui Me Quedo Restaurant
reviews: I asked where I could get good tasty shredded pork yellow rice beans & plantains & Aqui Me Quedo was the answer! Sam and his family really enjoy what they do & that’s making Puerto Rican dishes that taste so good.
Best bodega spot in town! I go here every morning for my bacon, egg, cheese on a toasted roll. Can't complain about the portion size.

Pretty small but quaint restaurant located at the intersection of Broad and Park Streets. There are about 3 small tables with chairs, as well as a long counter with bar stools facing Broad Street where you can sit and dine. The young man serving behind the food counter was very friendly and knowledgeable about the different types of food he was selling. The food was very good and filling as expected, if you're used to Puerto Rican foods. There was also a variety of dessert options. The place was clean on the inside and I was very impressed when I saw an older gentleman who obviously works at the restaurant (He was wearing a t-shirt with the name on it), sweeping the sidewalk and the streets outside the restaurant and picking up the trash. Bravo! I would definitely recommend this place based on my experience, and based on the amount of patrons that came in to pick up food while I was there, I guess others feel the same way too.
Love empanadillas marisco seafood place and P.R food good.
I'm been coming here for a long time and love it

name: The Half Door
reviews: Best St Patrick's place....great food, excellent service.. fun time

Food & service amazing! Went when Jack Riley played, awesome music, laid back sound, classics, contemporary and not so loud that my friends and I couldn't enjoy our food and conversation. The perfect combination. We will be back!
I really liked their food. I always get great service there. The place is always clean and the workers are always very friendly. Will come back again.
When in Hartford's Historic West End...

The atmosphere at the Half Door is just like being in Ireland. The occasions I have been here are on St. Patrick’s Day But I do want to return for some wonderful Irish dining at a quieter time. 
  On St. Patrick’s Day the menu is shortened to a few selections because it is so busy with people partying and dancing to the wonderful Irish music that is played. It is a very special night! I loved it!!! I’ll be back!

name: Lion's Den Vegetarian: Eat Ital; You will know Rasta! IRIE
reviews: Quite possibly the most conflicted review I've ever done. On the one hand, the value is tremendous -- you get a LOT of food at a very reasonable price. On the other hand, the "potluck" nature of it, overall bland taste, and the presentation/store ambiance leave more than a little to be desired. I'll be generous and go 4-stars. The curry soy pieces are easily the best part of this "sampler" I photographed. The rest of it? It reminds me of military slop, with a Jamaican/vegan twist. Worth a try though and, again, the value is definitely there.
Awesome food, super nice staff, always fantastic vibes. They charge affordable prices and the food quality is very good. Keep up the good work.
If you are vegetarian or you just don't want to have meat for the day this place here is spot-on you will love it.. can't even tell there's no meat
Warm friendly inviting great healthy restaurant . great prices 😁
IF YOU WANT YOUR FOOD FRESH AN YOUR A NO MEAT PERSON LIKE ME OMG YOU NEED TO VISIT

name: Andrea's Restaurante
reviews: Service was great. I was ordering take out at the Time.. The Restaurant was. Very Clean. I was Greeted really Quickly mad the Order was Placed. The Food is Outstanding. The Yellow Spanish Rice and Pink Beans was outstanding and there Pernil was Really Good. It's a Must Visit.
The music is always on point and the drinks are always on point. Love the mason jars 😉. The food is very good too!!!  I love hanging out there on the patio in the summer!!
Great services,awesome food I always feels welcome here. I really recommend this restaurant
Parking and lines to get a table are the downfall. Food is great, have tried the Pork chops with rice and beans. The beans were full of flavor and nice size chunks! Sangria was sweet and strong.
Andrea's is all about the food. Really great food at affordable prices and the portions are huge. The drinks are cheap too.
